title: Best of The Program | Guests: John Solomon & Juan Saldivar | 4/30/21
description:
Florida is releasing thousands of gene-hacked mosquitos to lower the overall population. Is mosquito genocide okay? Investigative journalist John Solomon joins to discuss the FBI raid against Rudy Giuliani and how he’s mentioned in the investigation too. Southlake, Texas, parent Juan Saldivar tells Glenn about his fight against critical race theory in his school district.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
